title: Create an account
name: CreateAccount
description: Creates an account in the backend database and in the Auth0 client. The username must be between 4 and 15 characters and be unique from usernames already existing for the Auth0 instance. The email must be valid and unique from emails already registered with the Auth0 instance. The password must be at least eight characters and include uppercase and lowercase letters and numbers. The account type must be one of 'Admin', 'Staff', 'Coach', or 'Volunteer'.

examples.title: Example request
examples.content:
{
 first_name: "Danny",
 last_name: "Porter",
 username: "d_porter",
 email: "d.porter@email.com",
 acct_type: "Volunteer",
 password: "passw0rd"
}

title: Delete an account
name: DeleteAccount
description: Deletes an account from the backend database and from the Auth0 instance. If one deletion fails, a rollback will be performed so that the backend and Auth0 remain in sync.

Parameter.description: Flag indicating if the event is pre-season (true) or post-season (false)

Success 200.description: The program that this event belongs to
The season that this event belongs to
Whether this event was held pre-season (true) or post-season (false)

Error 400.description: Request was missing event_date or pre_season flag

title: Delete an event by id
name: DeleteEvent

Deletes an event and all its associated stats from the database.

title: Get all stats for a specific season
name: GetReport

Success 200.description: The program that the student belongs to
The date of the pre-season data collection
The date of the post-season data collection

title: Update BMI results
name: UploadBMIStats
description: Given set of student ids, heights, and weights, updates the existing stats for the given student/event or creates them if they don't already exist. For created events, PACER will remain null.

Error 400.description: Request was missing event_date or pre_season flag

title: Update PACER results
name: UploadPacerStats
description: Given set of student ids and PACER results, updates the existing stats for the given student/event or creates them if they don't already exist. For created events, height and weight will remain null.

Error 400.description: Request was missing event_date or pre_season flag

title: Get all students for a program
name: GetStudentsByProgram
